testcase.name: Verify checkout-step-one page functionality with valid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is launched and Swaglabs is opened.............................passed Then User navigates to login page...........................................passed When User loged into swaglabs with Username "standard_user" and Password "secret_sauce".passed And User add the product to the cart and click on check out page............passed Then User enters "john" and "Anath" and "522311"............................passed And User clicks on Continue button in checkout information page.............passed Then It navigates to checkout overview page.................................passed
